text: Very new MRT station here for the area, bringing you from Orchard, down towards Botanical Garden and beyond. Located right in front of Gleneagles hospital, it's very convenient if you're visiting the area. Quite straightforward for moving around, especially if you follow signages.
Great mrt station. Toilets top class. New station built in 2024. Less crowded and beautiful artworks inside the station.
This is the second Metro Station for the botanical garden

Newly-opened station with side platforms - the southbound platform (towards Gardens by the Bay) is on the same floor as the ticket gates, while the northbound platform (towards Woodlands North) is downstairs

Serves the southernmost part of the Singapore Botanic Gardens (the "Botanic Gardens station" serves the northernmost part of the Gardens)

Napier is also where some of the Western embassies are situated
If you need to go to the British Council, or the embassies of Australia or the US, alight here (note that the UK High Commission is slightly nearer to Orchard Boulevard station)
An easy access to the Museum of Ice Cream Singapore
